meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Danny Parra Kate Jeracki Brendan Graham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6301.

td.p: Danny Parra, a sportscaster from Miami, Florida
Kate Jeracki, a newspaper staff writer from Fort Collins, Colorado
Brendan Graham, a soldier and a physician from San Antonio, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $46,602)

tr.td: TIE ONE ON
ALBUMS
ART "R"EVIEW
PLAY YOUR CARDS RIGHT
(Alex: Each response will be a playing card.)
STATE FLOWERS
MARK TWAIN NEVER SAID...
